text: The men's national cricket team of India is governed by the Board of Control for Cricket in India (BCCI). The team has full membership of the International Cricket Council (ICC), so it has both Test and One Day International (ODI) status. ==India's statistics== India's results in international matches Format Matches Drawn Tied No result Inaugural Match Test 569 221 1 0 v England; 25 June 1932 ODI 1,029 0 9 43 v England; 13 July 1974 T20I 199 0 4 5 v South Africa; 1 December 2006 == India's squad == * Captain: Rohit Sharma * Vice Captain: Ajinkya Rahane (Test), Hardik Pandya (ODI, T20I) * Wicket-Keeper: KL Rahul, Rishabh Pant. * Batsmen: Virat Kohli, Shubman Gill, Shreyas Iyer, Suryakumar Yadav, KL Rahul, Ruturaj Gaikwad, Ishan Kishan, Cheteshwar Pujara, Mrinal Karna , Rinku Singh, Yashasvi Jaiswal. * All Rounders: Ravindra Jadeja, Ravichandran Ashwin, Axar Patel, Deepak Hooda, Shivam Dube. * Bowlers: Jasprit Bumrah, Mohammad Shami, Mohammad Siraj, Kuldeep Yadav, Yuzvendra Chahal, Umran Malik, Shardul Thakur. == Uniforms == Current Sponsors Hyundai, Mastercard, Dream 11, LafargeHolcim, Ambuja Cements, ACC Present Jerseys 2021 Sponsor: Adidas, BYJU, Killer Jeans Past Jerseys 1999 Sponsor: ITC Limited (Wills & ITC Hotels), Sahara, Asics 2007 Sponsor: Sahara, Nike 2009 Sponsor: Oppo, Nike 2012 Sponsor: Sahara, Nike 2014 Sponsor: Nike, STAR India 2016 Sponsor: Oppo, Nike, MPL Sports, BYJU 1992 Sponsor: ISC (Blue and Red Green and white Stripes) 1987 - 1991/1996 Sponsor: Willis (Light blue and Thick Yellow Stripe) 1975 - 1987 (White and V neck rounded Green stripes) 2003 Sponsor: Sahara, Ambey Valley. (Blue with Brushstrokes of the India Flag (Tilted)) ==References== Category:Cricket teams in India Category:1932 establishments in India Category:Test cricket teams Category:Men's national cricket teams
title: India men's national cricket team
